work.title: FX Networks
work.description: A total redesign of the FX Networks website built from the ground up using some of the latest tech. I was responsible primarily for the front-end development but also worked closely with the product and client teams to ensure the site was built to spec.

work.title: GAAD Foundation
work.description: I am currently working on porting two GAAD websites over from WordPress to NextJS with TypeScript, tRPC, Prisma, NextAuth, and Mantine. I'm leading the team in developing a re-architected site following Atomic Design principles as well as creating a custom CMS to better serve our needs.

work.title: Fox / Fox Sports
work.description: I was responsible for the front-end development that integrated cable providers to allow users to login, watch, and favorite content. I also worked on the payment gateway and built the Apple Pay integration that allowed users to subscribe to content.

work.title: Collide
work.description: Collide is a platform that allows users to create and share interactive experiences. I was one of the first engineers on the team and helped build the initial version of the platform, which included live chat, video streaming, and user payments.

work.title: LegalZoom
work.description: I lead the team in developing rapid prototypes for new features and products to test market viability. After evaluating what technologies worked the best, I built a command line utility tool to quickly scaffold new projects with minimum setup.

work.title: ScoreBig
work.description: ScoreBig is a platform that allows users to purchase tickets to events at a discount. I worked as a full-stack engineer developing new features and maintaining the existing codebase. I also worked on the internal tools used by the dev team.
